citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2 pm on
30-MAY-19.
After arrival knocked on front door, called and left message, waited 30 minutes.
